incoming.page_description: Tohaina ngā kōrero ngaro ki tō mātou rōpū tautoko
incoming.feature_disabled_description: Kei te monokia tēnei āhuatanga i tēnei wā. Pā mai ki te tautoko mō te āwhina.
incoming.memo_placeholder: He whakamārama poto (hei tauira, Tono tautuhi kupuhipa anō)
incoming.memo_hint: Āwhina mātou ki te tuku i tō karere ki te tangata tika
incoming.recipient_aria_label: Kōwhiria he kaiwhiwhi mō tēnei mea huna
incoming.recipient_hint: Kōwhiria ko wai ka whiwhi i tēnei karere haumaru
incoming.no_recipients_available: Kāore he kaiwhiwhi e wātea ana
incoming.secret_content_placeholder: Whakapiri kōrero ngaro ki konei (kupuhipa, kī, me ērā atu)
incoming.secret_content_hint: Ka whakamunaina ēnei kōrero, kotahi noa te wā ka kitea
incoming.success_info_title: He aha te mea e pā mai ana?
incoming.success_info_description: Ka taea e te kaiwhiwhi te tiro i tēnei mea huna kotahi noa te wā. I muri i te tiro, ka mukua tūturu te mea huna.
incoming.tagline2: Kia tawhiti atu ngā kupuhipa me ngā raraunga tūmataiti i te īmēra me ngā rārangi kōrerorero
incoming.end_of_experience_suggestion: Tiakina tō rīhīti mō ō rēkōtanga.
